## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a70aa8c59bc393d5df205527b22e5db54e16ea4c7e36278003fdce1ab03b9c0e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@isfront/locale' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
